p: Fresh leaves of D. viscosa (Sapindaceae) were collected from the Herbal Garden, College of Pharmacy, King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and botanically identified by Dr. Mohammed Yusuf, Field Taxonomist, Department of Pharmacognosy, College of Pharmacy, King Saud University. A voucher specimen (voucher #15787) was deposited at the herbarium of Pharmacognosy Department, College of pharmacy, KSU, Riyadh, KSA.
